newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: PRESS DIGEST - Sri Lanka Newspapers - December 26.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Sri Lanka Newspapers - December 26.

text.p: These are the leading stories in the Sri Lankan press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
Severe drug shortage seen in government hospitals in first six months of 1997 because of on-going work-to-rule campaign by pharmacists and para-medics.
Part of 10,000 kilogrammes of hashish worth 100 million rupees seized from a trawler off Chilaw, north of Colombo, disappear from police custody.
Shell Gas Lanka asks government permission to raise price of gas again next year.
Security forces lost five naval vessels and two aircraft during counter-insurgency operations this year, Defence Ministry officials say.
